name: Porcus Requiem
description:
The Three Little Pigs are trying to live a peaceful life but the wolves keep attacking them! You have to repair your house everyday or else they will break in, but don't get caught while working either!

This is a 1-3 players coop game. Gamepads are required to play. 

Gather materials and repair your house. When you're done, get back inside quickly! Be careful to complete your task everyday or the wolves might break in...

Made by Yann David, Grégoire Jacquemin, Jérémy Briant, Antoine Jego & Yohan Chenebault.

This is our submission for GGJ 2020! You can download the sources over there!
